meaningMnemonic: This word consists of kanji with hiragana attached. Because the hiragana ends with an う sound, you know this word is a verb. The kanji itself means <kanji>Shamisen song</kanji>, so the verb version is <vocabulary>to sing</vocabulary>.
readingMnemonic: Remember how 歌う means "to sing" too? Well it has the same reading. If you know that one, you know this one. Yay!
